data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Tsuga mertensiana (Mountain hemlock) from sample HOOD-12

Exposition SW, Slope 3 deg, Geology: Vulk. Tuff tiefgr. verwitt. , Tree line 1700 m, av. Tree height 25 m, Tree cover 60%, Shrub cover 1%, Herb cover 80%, Vegatation type: Aus Rotten hervorgegangen. Homogen, Film number: 681A
